price: Wir haben fürwahr die Macht dazu, dir zu zeigen, was Wir ihnen androhen.
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
